Load BdE catalogs

Source: R/catalogs.R
bde_catalog_load.Rd

Load the time-series catalogs provided by BdE.

Usage

bde_catalog_load(
  catalog = "ALL",
  parse_dates = TRUE,
  cache_dir = NULL,
  update_cache = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

Source

Time-series bulk data download

Arguments

catalog

A single value indicating the catalogs to be updated or "ALL" as a shorthand. See Details.

parse_dates

Logical. If TRUE the dates would be parsed using bde_parse_dates().

cache_dir

A path to a cache directory. The directory can also be set via options with options(bde_cache_dir = "path/to/dir").

update_cache

Logical. If TRUE the requested file would be updated on the cache_dir.

verbose

Logical TRUE or FALSE, display information useful for debugging.

Value

A tibble

Details

Accepted values for catalog are:

CODEPUBLICATIONUPDATE FREQUENCYFREQUENCY
BEStatistical BulletinDailyMonthly
SISummary IndicatorsDailyDaily
TCExchange RatesDailyDaily
TIInterest RatesDailyDaily
PBBank Lending SurveyQuarterlyQuarterly

Use "ALL" as a shorthand for updating all the catalogs at a glance.

If the requested catalog is not cached bde_catalog_update() is invoked.

See also

Other catalog: bde_catalog_search(), bde_catalog_update()

Examples

# \donttest{
bde_catalog_load("TI", verbose = TRUE)
#> tidyBdE> Caching on temporary directory C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpGEsG8r
#> tidyBdE> Need to download catalog TI
#> tidyBdE> Cache dir is C:\Users\RUNNER~1\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpGEsG8r

About tidyBdE

Developed by Diego H. Herrero.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on Bootstrapious.
